name: Modern Square Tabs for Firefox [Tabs on bottom]
description: Modified the Style "Modern Square Tabs for Firefox Australis" by varinys to get a nice look when you're using Classic Theme Restorer and "Tabs not on top"/"Tabs on bottom"
additional_info: You have to use "Round Tabs" and "Tabs not on top V2" in CTR or else this theme will not work.
